QuestData.Title: Dark Side of the Moon
QuestData.Description: Xavius led Ysera past here, but their destination is unclear. This twisted wickedness smothers my mind!$b$bThese refugees tell of an ancient Moonwell hidden in the ruins of their home. If it somehow resisted this corruption...$b$bI will beg of Elune a vision to give me direction. With her light, I may find my husband yet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Tyrande while she holds her vigil at the Ancient Moonwell.
QuestData.RewardText: He is still alive, but the rest remains to be seen.
